body_html:
I think loading estimators to keep training, evaluating, or perform predictions is fairly simple.
My issue is with loading estimators in a lower level api to do more than what those three estimator ModeKeys allow. This is pretty difficult to do in my opinion. I gave up and used a workaround.

body:
I think loading estimators to keep training, evaluating, or perform predictions is fairly simple. 
My issue is with loading estimators in a lower level api to do more than what those three estimator ModeKeys allow. This is pretty difficult to do in my opinion. I gave up and used a workaround.
